title: How in vitro fertilization (IVF) works
description: Infertility affects 1 in 8 couples worldwide. But in the last 40 years, more than 5 million babies have been born using in vitro fertilization (IVF). How does it work? Nassim Assefi and Brian A. Levine detail the science behind making a baby in a lab.
author: Nassim Assefi and Brian A. Levine
keywords: TED, talks, TED-Ed, human body, pregnancy, children, biology, science, animation, physiology, invention, technology
